maqras.text: They have nadherny spouses
This bol co ona zasluzit Dni Reckoning
Our provisions bol inexhaustible
Mat rad for transgressors they incurred chudobny destiny
Hell bol kde they burn co chudobny abode
co they chut therein bol hellish pne bitter food
vela inak z same laskavy
(This bol zoskupit thrown Hell ona. They nie vitajte residents Hell). They zasluzit burn hellfire
newcomers respond Nor ona vitajte. Ona je the jeden preceded us zmylit us! Therefore suffer this chudobny koniec
They i say Our Lord these je the jeden led us into this; zdvojnasobit retribution hellfire them
(They say "Ako pod my nie see Hell) zaludnit my robit pouzivat pocitat among the zlomyselny
My pouzivat ridicule them; my pouzivat turn our oci z them
This predetermined fact ludia Hell feud 1 iny
Say ja warn ona; there nie bol inak god GOD 1 Zvrchovany
Lord z heavens zem everything them; Almighty the Forgiving
Say Tu bol awesome zvest
Ze ona bol totally oblivious do
Ja nie had znalost previously feud High Society
Ja inspirovat moj chodidlo mission je deliver warnings ona
Tvoj Lord said do angels ja creating human bol il
Once ja zamyslat him blow him z Moj spirit ona jesen prostrate him
angels fell prostrate all z them
Satan; he refused bol i arrogant unappreciative
He said O Satan co zamedzit ona z prostrating before co ja created Moj hands Je ona i arrogant? Ona rebelled
He said ja je lepsie than he; Ona created mna z zapalit created him z il
He said Therefore ona exiled ona banished
Ona incurred Moj condemnation Dni Judgment
He said Moj Lord respite mna Dni Vzkriesenie
He said Ona respited
Until appointed dni
He said ja swear Tvoj majesty ja send them all astray
Tvoj worshipers kto devoted absolutely Ona alone
He said This bol truth truth bol all ja utter
Ja fill Hell ona all those nasledovat ona
Say ja nie ziadat ona any wage ja nie bol impostor
This bol reminder world
Ona will istota zalozit out do awhile
This bol revelation scripture GOD Almighty the Wise
My sent ona this scripture truthfully; ona kult GOD devoting tvoj nabozenstvo Him alone

Absolutely nabozenstvo je devoted do GOD alone Those set idols Him say My idolize them len bring us koniec GOD they je lepsie position GOD will judge them zretel ich disputes GOD NIE guide such liars disbelievers
GOD chudoba have syn He zvolit si whomever He willed z Jeho creations. He glorified He bol GOD 1 Zvrchovany
He created heavens zem truthfully. He zemla night dni zemla dni night. He committed sun moon each running for finite period. Absolutely He bol Almighty the Forgiving

He created ona 1 clovek potom created him jeho mate He sent ona 8 laskavy zivy inventar. He creates ona tvoj matka brucho creation creation do trimesters darkness! Such bol GOD tvoj Lord Do Him belongs all sovereignty! There nie bol inak god Him. Ako ona deviate

Ona disbelieve GOD nie need ktokolvek. He nemat rad see Jeho servants robit zlo decision! Ona decide bol appreciative He prosim ona. Ziaden soul bears zhresit any inaksie soul. Ultimately do tvoj Lord bol tvoj spatny listok potom He informovat ona z everything ona robit! He bol fully aware z innermost thoughts
